administrative_laws.purpose: Promotes transparency by providing citizens access to information held by public authorities.
Establishes tribunals to adjudicate disputes related to government employees' service matters.
Creates ombudsman institutions to investigate corruption allegations against public officials.
Establishes the Central Vigilance Commission to oversee anti-corruption measures in government.
Provides for legislative assemblies and governance structures in Union Territories.
Facilitates the redrawing of electoral constituencies based on population changes.

tax_laws.purpose: Governs the levy, assessment, and collection of income tax for individuals and entities.
Implements a unified indirect tax system for goods and services across India.
Regulates duties on imports and exports and controls cross-border trade.
Imposes excise duties on goods manufactured or produced in India (partially subsumed by GST).
Amends tax laws and introduces fiscal policies through the annual Union Budget.
Levied tax on the wealth of individuals and entities (abolished in 2015 but relevant historically).
